text: Actress Lindsay Lohan, originally of Cold Spring Harbor and Merrick, says she suffered a snakebite during her current vacation in Phuket, Thailand. “ I love this, it ’ s so beautiful, amazing place... aside from my snake bite, ” the 31 - year - old “ Mean Girls ” star said in the first of several Instagram Story videos Thursday, according to a transcript by E! News. “ Hi! I ’ m still in Phuket in Thailand, it ’ s beautiful here and yeah I got bit by a snake on a hike the other day, ” she continued in another video. “ The positive side of it is, I ’ m OK. Happy New Year and God bless. Ciao, ” she added in another, before concluding in a fourth, “
